Major public voices are “Compensation for damage” and “Prevention of recurrence” of Mercedes-Benz.

Compensation for damage (피해보상)

Cheongna
○ 4.5 bil KRW support
○ E 200 Free 1 yr support

Current EQ owners
○ Letter with 300k charging voucher

EQE owners



Stock and sales strategy to the normalization
Define programs and prioritize based on the target group with volume.

Start programs for limited target group with low media risk

Deploy the commitment to the public 

Release normal sales programs for potential customers




Prevention of recurrence (재발방지)

Battery 

New cars
○ Free regular Check-up




“Commitment to Public”
Actions to be considered

○ Trade-in offer for EQE owners
Actions to be considered

○  Special insurance for new EQ sales
○ HQ to explain a battery plan for K-market
○ Battery recycling factory tour with KOL
○ Support fire department for special tools & equipment.
